description: Smartwool athlete and ultrarunner Rob Krar teamed up to make a sock that can handle the longest trail runs. Introducing the PhD® Pro Endurance Krar Print Crew. This running sock features Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability, the Virtually Seamless™ toe for added comfort, and a 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed, performance-oriented fit—so you can stay confident on the most rugged trails. And body-mapped mesh zones keep things breathable mile 1 to mile 100. Get ready to rack up more miles than ever before.
name: Smartwool PhD Pro Endurance Krar Print Zero Cushion Crew Socks - Mens
